column5: Snog is what the British do while snogging.  Snog is also the correct pronounciation of Snag with a British accent.   Hey BBR,  Fancy a snog?
Looks like fun to me!  Nice action shots on the net job.  Good to hear from you again Rich.

Well Sleded and I decided we'd get in doo doo with the wives and went fishing all day. Now that was a good choice! First we went down to check out Amo's tournament.. money in our pockets and all but to our surprise nobody was down there. Hmmm.. well I guess that meant we were heading out to some local cat haunts in search of big channel cats. The first spot we tried was last year's "Area 57".. right off the bat I missed one on a chunk of shad meat. I thought things would be good from the almost instant action.. but 'twas not so. This spot blew. Sleded did manage one little channel cat which gave us some hope for the day.    Sleded also had trouble getting the net around this one for me. Man did I ever want it!      Whew, thanks Eric! I dont know what I would have done if you couldnt have got the net around her.  As it got later, we moved to the mouth of this creek in hopes that the bigger ones would be cruising. Bites were constant, but they weren't our target species. Bullheads were littering this spot and apparently had the munchies. They wouldn't leave the cut bait alone.      Well.. after that, no channel cats. Then the rain/snow started and we decided 12 hours was enough fishing for us. I came back to the doghouse at about 12:30 am  :wink:  Oh well it was a great day out. Just another scouting mission. Any day now those big kitties will move in.
Great post Rich!  Cheers  Jen
right on guys!

Rich you should not be in the doghouse for fishing.Thanks for the report.Come and see us more often.Hen pecking should be illegal.  nice pics at least you were not skunked before you returned to the doghouse.  MTP
Nice Rich - and its really nice to see you posting once again - your humour has been missed!!!  Welcome back  Don
Not bad at all Rich... all the times i head over to dover, you have yet to learn me your methods... how u been doing anyways?
Tough weekend it was for cats. Went after work last night and after work today managed a bunch of small bullheads but nothing to big. Anyways nice to see you posting again rich, great report.
Finally a BBR post!!!!!!!! Been waiting for one way too long!!
Nice report, haven't seen posting for a while can't wait for the monster channel cat reports and are there going to be anymore videos???
Nie looking channel,throw that Bullhead away I hate them.Good to see you here again. Joe
Right on Rich!  Dude you make sure "the wife" knows that fishing is part of the package!  Cheers, UF
Great shots Rich. Always glad to see your posts. You're actually one of my inspirations on why I changed from lurker to poster.  I know that my future rock bass posts will be appeciated.
Great report and pics!!!... and those are some very nice Bullheads! They fry up good too!
Couple cool cats...
Maybe you could shave a few minutes off your fishing time and wash that thermos.    Do you ever eat those cats?
Welcome back Rich
Helps if you read the boards & calendar boys.....& besides ya both know where i live.  Good to see you had a good day out.....I am hoping to get out for a few hrs tonight.
Great posts dude..
This directionless vessel of humanhood has but one account on our board. He is now on mod cue which means that a mod will have to approve everyone of his posts prior to the post becoming visible.
Thanks Roy ...
Sigh,  The daycare gig never ends. sheesh!  May is just around the corner Roy.
